question:
Which of the following attempted to control the sovereign power of Punjab?
1) Abdus Samad Khan
2) Zakariya Khan
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: When Sikh groups started consolidating themselves as a political force, these activities raised the alarm for the Mughal governors of the Lahore subah. Abdus Samad Khan and Zakariya Khan attempted to control the sovereign power of Punjab.
